body:
So I decided I would record some Soups, when lo and behold Tino was there.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kaM3QHGiUY0&feature=youtu.be
(1v1 between tino and I starts at 14:10)

Also since this isn't exactly Avicus related I can archive the post if needed :)

replies.body:
Dat coincidence doe.

Anyway...
I'm okay with it, I let people advertise on my server, because I know my players will stay with me, but Avicus has a HUGE problem with advertising, and you just posted a link, leading to a video that's non-Avicus-related, with a server IP.

I have no problem with this, it just lets people have more fun, try new servers, but Avicus is harsh about it. I would suggest thinking about removing it. :/
